mapper.sql: SELECT BOARD_NO boardNo , CATEGORY_NAME category , NICKNAME boardWriter , BOARD_TITLE boardTitle , BOARD_CONTENT boardContent , VIEW_COUNT viewCount , CT_BOARD.ENROLL_DATE enrollDate , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CT_BOARD_LIKE WHERE CT_BOARD_LIKE.BOARD_NO = CT_BOARD.BOARD_NO) AS likes
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CT_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
FROM CT_BOARD JOIN CT_MEMBER USING (USER_NO) JOIN CT_BOARD_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY enrollDate DESC

SELECT CT_BOARD.BOARD_NO boardNo , BOARD_TITLE boardTitle , BOARD_CONTENT boardContent , NICKNAME boardWriter , VIEW_COUNT viewCount , CATEGORY_NAME category , CT_BOARD.ENROLL_DATE boardEnrollDate , ORIGIN_NAME orginName , CHANGE_NAME changeName , FILE_PATH filePath , REPLY_NO replyNo , REPLY_CONTENT replyContent , CT_BOARD_REPLY.USER_NO replyWriter , CT_BOARD_REPLY.ENROLL_DATE replyEnrollDate , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CT_BOARD_LIKE WHERE CT_BOARD.BOARD_NO = CT_BOARD_LIKE.BOARD_NO) AS LIKES FROM CT_BOARD JOIN CT_BOARD_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN CT_MEMBER USING (USER_NO) LEFT JOIN CT_BOARD_ATTACHMENT ON (BOARD_NO = REF_BNO) LEFT JOIN CT_BOARD_REPLY ON (CT_BOARD.BOARD_NO = CT_BOARD_REPLY.BOARD_NO) WHERE CT_BOARD.STATUS = 'Y' AND CT_BOARD.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
